amendment.description: Relative to the treatment of foreign prisoners.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3387 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3387 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 50. Record Vote Number: 143.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3387 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
